thread.section_title: CandyWarehouse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CandyWarehouse.com | www.candywarehouse.com | 7 of 23
thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text:
I order a lot of candy (on line) for a party I was throwing. Since I was a new customer, I received a call from the company the next day to ensure that it was my order and not fraud. I appreciate the extra step they took just in case. The order was shipped immediately and arrived in perfect condition with no errors
Thank you candywarehouse. I would use this company again
